name: Zoo Constructor
description: Zoo Constructor - Construct and manage an animal park. Economic simulation with complex animal, climate and plant simulation. The constructor has tools for soil, water, roads, fences and plants, personnel, visitor facilities and decorations available.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7 Processor: 3 GHz Intel Pentium® D, AMD Athlon™64 3000+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GT, ATI Radeon X1800 or better (min. 256 MB Video- RAM, DirectX®9c, Shadermodel 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7 Processor: Dualcore CPU (Intel E4300, AMD Athlon™ X2 3800+) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTX, ATI Radeon 3870 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
